title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING AND ADOPTING THE MARKET MANAGEMENT COMMITTEE RESOLUTION NO. 2025-02 DATED SEPTEMBER 12, 2025, ENTITLED ”A RESOLUTION DECLARING THAT ABANDONED PUBLIC MARKET STALLS IN BOTH THE POBLACION PUBLIC MARKET AND BATONG MALAKE PUBLIC MARKET FOR THREE (3) CONSECUTIVE MONTHS SHALL BE CONSIDERED AS CLOSED AND MUST BE TURNED- OVER TO THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS”. Author
